last_episode_to_air.name: Tracy Morgan's Giant Shark Tank Revealed!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winter is coming and Tracy Morgan is still waiting for his shark tank.

name: Tanked
overview: Following the antics of two brothers-in-law as they run the largest aquarium manufacturing company in the nation, Tanked dunks viewers into the high-decibel, family-owned business of Acrylic Tank Manufacturing (ATM). Led by business partners, best friends and constant rivals Wayde King and Brett Raymer, this 13,000 square foot facility, located in Las Vegas, produces some of the most outrageous, larger-than-life and one-of-a-kind tanks for some of the most striking fish and clients around.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Wayde King and Brett Raymer are back, and they are making outlandish dream tanks a reality for their fish-loving clients. The guys must wade into the deep end to come up with creative solutions for some of the most outrageous and challenging builds they've ever tackled. Some of the incredible tank builds that put Wayde, Brett and their crew to the test include a jellyfish tank for a sub-freezing bar at Mandalay Bay, a mobile school bus tank and a shark tank for the home of actor and comedian Tracy Morgan.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Wayde King and Brett Raymer are back and about to take on the biggest tanks of their careers and an extra-special type of clientele who gives them a run for their money! Wayde and Brett are tasked with building some of the most enormous and awe-inspiring tanks and aquariums for top celebrities, luxury hotels and casinos, Fortune 500 businesses, private homes and millionaire homeowners across the country that are filled with the most exotic, unusual, colorful and dangerous fish in the world.

episodes.name: Brett Takes a Dive
episodes.overview: A quarantine tank for some hands on clients has the ATM team wishing for solitary confinement, Brett buys a clunker to build a car theme tank in record time without considering the consequences, and Brett is nervous to use his new scuba skills.

episodes.name: Swimming with the Sharks
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett explore the other side of the law and design a 1000 gallon mob inspired tank, Heather reluctantly enters a shark tank to help place inserts, and the ATM team gives a relocated New York family a one of a kind NYC themed Phone Booth Aquarium.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: A fish feeding problem turns into an all-day affair, a tank on hydraulics gives a new business a lift and makes waves with a hidden engagement ring, and the owner of a free standing 1950s diner gives some heavy demands for a tank to match the d√©cor.

episodes.name: Be Cool
episodes.overview: A 57,000 gallon tank for a mega church is finally complete and ready to be baptized by Wayde and Brett; a engaged girlfriend surprises her fiance with a keg tank for his man cave; and Brett adds some uninvited flare to a lawyer's reception desk shark tank.

episodes.name: Good Karma
episodes.overview: A request for a Feng Shui tank has Brett rearranging the office and on everyone's last nerve; a custom overhead bed tank for an little boy brings the ATM team to tears; and Heather gets her revenge tenfold by having Wayde & Brett go on a caged shark dive.

episodes.name: Tricks of the Trade
episodes.overview: A skateboard ramp tank has Wayde & Brett grinding their gears to find a solution to keep the acrylic from scratching; The ATM team builds a surprise octopus tank for Wayde's birthday; and Vegas weather is threatening a meltdown on an outdoor gumball tank.

episodes.name: Fish Out of Water
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett are back home in New York visiting a long time client to go over the install of a shark tank for his newly constructed orthodontist office. Later, the boys come up with a display tank for an appliance store that will wow its customers.

episodes.name: Old School vs. New School
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett take a walk on the techy side by building a tank for a state-of-the-art robotic systems company in Massachusetts. On the flip side, they fly to Chicago, Illinois to meet up with pinball enthusiast, who needs a tank for his game room.

episodes.name: Serenity Now
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett build a show piece for a furniture store in North Carolina. In Las Vegas, the owner of Black Spade Tattoo Parlor wants a tank that will alleviate any ink newbies worries by creating a calming environment in an otherwise stressful place.

episodes.name: Roll with It
episodes.overview: Brett & Wayde look to hit this one out of the park with a tank inside a school bus for a Pensacola baseball team; a nail salon is looking to redefine acrylic; bad news hits when one tank drops, hopefully the other tank will impress.

episodes.name: Tanks for the Memories
episodes.overview: The guys talk about their favorite tanks, fish, and pranks from season 1, including behind the scenes stories and never before seen footage from all their favorite tanks.

episodes.name: Polar Opposites
episodes.overview: The guys go to Southern California to build a 35-foot-long marquee tank for Valley View Casino under a serious time crunch, then head back to Vegas for a freezing cold jellyfish tank inside of the Monte Carlo Minus 5 Ice Bar.

episodes.name: Most Challenging Tanks
episodes.overview: The guys countdown their toughest tank builds from season 1. Brett and Wayde will take us through the sleepless nights, the experiments, and down and dirty moments that made some of the most amazing tanks you‚Äôve ever seen.

episodes.name: Where the Wild Things Are
episodes.overview: Animals are welcome as Wayde and Brett get creative with three different tanks for Petco. Also, a Kiss-themed miniature golf course looks to hit a hole in one with a rockin‚Äô tank worthy of rock royalty.

episodes.name: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Tank
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett get one of their biggest clients and one of their smallest as they build tanks for Emmy award winning comedian Tracy Morgan and a little kid who's a big fan of ATM.

episodes.name: For Love of the Game...Or Money?
episodes.overview: The ATM duo must score a touchdown with NFL's Bart Scott and turn his ponds into "Club Aqua".

episodes.name: Flying High and Sinking Deep
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett build a tank for a successful manufacturing company in Chicago that gives them the star treatment on a chartered flight. An interactive submarine tank for a Philly restaurant proves a bigger challenge than anticipated.

episodes.name: Nuclear Family
episodes.overview: The ATM family takes a walk down memory lane with fantastic tanks of the year. Sharing along the way what it takes to work alongside your wife, father, and brother-in-law.

episodes.name: Love Is an Illusion
episodes.overview: Neil Patrick Harris wants the boys at ATM to build a tank based on Harry Houdini‚Äôs famous water escape at the exclusive Magic Castle club in Los Angeles. Back in Las Vegas, Wayde has big plans for his 15 year wedding anniversary.

episodes.name: On the Road Again
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett embark on a journey back in time, reflecting on their not-so-average experiences building tanks across America.

episodes.name: Midwest Zest
episodes.overview: Heather plans an ambitious set of condo tanks for a property company, but will Wayde approve? Plus, Little Caesars commission a unique tank for a children's hospital.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Wayde King and Brett Raymer are back, and they are making outlandish dream tanks a reality for their fish-loving clients. The guys must wade into the deep end to come up with creative solutions for some of the most outrageous and challenging builds they've ever tackled. Some of the incredible tank builds that put Wayde, Brett and their crew to the test include a jellyfish tank for a sub-freezing bar at Mandalay Bay, a mobile school bus tank and a shark tank for the home of actor and comedian Tracy Morgan.

episodes.name: Pranks and Dranks!
episodes.overview: Jackass creator, Jeff Tremaine, gets a tank gnarly enough to be the centerpiece of this prankster's man cave and back east, Tropical Smoothie Caf√© gets a sweet treat for its customers.

episodes.name: Learn to Love or Love to Learn
episodes.overview: Love is in the Air when Las Vegas Weddings asks ATM to build an Old-Vegas themed tank and Heather & Wayde renew their wedding vows. At St. Leo University in Florida, it's gonna take some real brains to get a giant tank into a new student common area.

episodes.name: Groovy Sarcophagus, Man
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde visit New York to create a Cleopatra-inspired tank for a boutique hotel in the Catskill Mountains. In New Jersey, the boys are challenged to build a Lava Lamp tank for the headquarters of Spencer's Gifts.

episodes.name: Tip of the Hat to the Devils
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde play with when fire they make a tank for the Fairleigh Dickinson Devils. When the Devils ask for flames inside the tank, there‚Äôs no saying no or else. Back in Vegas, a team of hat makers want a super-sized top hat aquarium to be their sh

episodes.name: Spin the Bottles
episodes.overview: ATM plans tries to blast off with a Rocket Ship Tank complete with launch pad, countdown, and a smoke machine- but will they be cleared for takeoff? Plus vineyard owners present the ultimate challenge when they request a tank made from a rickety old wagon

episodes.name: A Guiding Light to Fitness
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett get physical when they build a multi-activity tank for a fitness mogul. Down South, the guys are building an enormous hexagonal shaped tank for a casino in Alabama, which must include a scaled replica of a historical lighthouse.

episodes.name: Nigiri and the NBA
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett have the coveted task of creating a temporary tank for NBA star, Dwyane Wade, as he launches his new shoe line. In North Carolina, Wayde and Brett will tackle a sushi and burger filled aquarium for Cowfish Restaurant.

episodes.name: Fermenting Donuts
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett dive into a brand new undertaking transporting a fully operational beer fermenter. The guys head south to create an iconic donut-shaped tank inspired by the renowned Dunkin' Donuts.

episodes.name: A Healthy Dose of ATM
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett tackle a strange request for a syringe-shaped aquarium for Cooper Family Medical in Florida. The guys have their most difficult client yet, themselves. ATM moved into a new shop and must build themselves an aquarium.

episodes.name: Jurassic Campground
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett let Redneck show off his RV knowledge by designing an RV aquarium. The guys have outdone themselves with a tank that is home to some of the deadliest creatures around. ATM builds a massive indoor aquarium that houses both gators and sharks

episodes.name: Popcorn on the High Seas
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett are recruited by Westfield Mall to fabricate two tanks including a Navy-inspired sailboat aquarium to spice up the mall‚Äôs new food court. Back in Vegas the Popcorn Girl commissions ATM to transform a vintage popcorn maker into a tank.

episodes.name: Sweet Memories
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett take a trip down memory lane when a Coney Island Applebee‚Äôs requests a tank that pays homage to Coney Island while the area rebuilds in the wake of Hurricane Sandy. Back in Vegas, Freed‚Äôs Bakery requests a cake display case aquarium.

episodes.name: Just What the Doctor Ordered
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett recreate a spine insert for an aquarium that will stand tall in a rehabilitation facility‚Äôs office. In Southern California, they bring a little piece of nature into a doctor‚Äôs office when they create an underwater forest.

episodes.name: Smiling Is the Best Medicine
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett join Las Vegas‚Äô First Friday street fair when they develop a photo booth into a aquarium for the 24 hour event. Across the nation at Nationwide Children‚Äôs Hospital the guys create an underwater wonderland.

episodes.name: Lifestyles of the Fish & Famous
episodes.overview: Go behind the paparazzi‚Äôs flashbulbs to see some of the amazing tanks Brett & Wayde have built for Hollywood elite. The massive shark tank for Tracy Morgan, the Houdini themed aquarium for Neil Patrick Harris, and a namesake tank for Rock Gods, KISS.

episodes.name: Brace Yourself for Employee of the Month
episodes.overview: Ocean waves are being molded out of acrylic when ATM brings a realistic reef into a luxury condo complex. Then the guys build a tank in the shape of cooling knee brace complete with realistic looking ice . Wayde offers an incentive to his employees.

episodes.name: Tricks and Trees
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett head to Camp Oak at Ojai Valley Inn & Spa and are challenged to build an aquarium inside the trunk of an oak tree. Back in Las Vegas a Halloween store‚Äôs request for a coffin tank brings out the scare tactics in everyone. Boo!

episodes.name: Rock 'n Roll Eruption!
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett put their creativity to the test when a client requests an 8-piece drum set tank that is fully playable. At the Lahaina Grill, the Hawaiian-born owners want to bring a little piece of the island back to their new bar.

episodes.name: Legal Vending Machine
episodes.overview: Wayde wants to keep things FRESH at ATM - With his team and his tanks! To keep his ATM team motivated he‚Äôs sending them to team building boot camp in hopes they can all learn to better work together to pull off two incredible salt water tanks!

episodes.name: Tracy and his Octopus
episodes.overview: Funnyman Tracy Morgan was so impressed by his ATM shark tank that he‚Äôs coming back for round two! This time, it‚Äôs a new home for his beloved octopus. To get this tank installed on time, Brett and Wayde will have to move in with Tracy for a few days!

episodes.name: Crazy Client Requests
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde work to make their clients‚Äô outrageous tank dreams a reality, even though sometimes it‚Äôs a nightmare for the ATM crew. Through some never before seen footage, you‚Äôll see that when the going gets tough, things can get a little crazy!

episodes.name: Betty White's Got an App for That
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett get in touch with their wild sides when they travel to Sunny California to install an animal themed tank for Betty White. Hold the phone! Next they look to their own backyard to install a smart phone themed tank.

episodes.name: Tanked for the Holidays
episodes.overview: It‚Äôs beginning to look a lot like the Christmas around ATM when Wayde and Brett are asked to create their largest holiday-themed tank ever! The good tidings keep rolling in when a snow globe tank is requested for a winter celebration.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Wayde King and Brett Raymer are back and about to take on the biggest tanks of their careers and an extra-special type of clientele who gives them a run for their money! Wayde and Brett are tasked with building some of the most enormous and awe-inspiring tanks and aquariums for top celebrities, luxury hotels and casinos, Fortune 500 businesses, private homes and millionaire homeowners across the country that are filled with the most exotic, unusual, colorful and dangerous fish in the world.

episodes.name: Driving New Business
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde are challenged to turn an entire Toyota Highlander into an aquarium while simultaneously opening a new ATM office in South Florida. Brett decides to turn a vintage slot machine into a tank to bring a little bit of Vegas to South Florida.

episodes.name: NASCAR and Baseball Champions Tanks
episodes.overview: NASCAR champ Ryan Newman and his wife, Krissie, ask for a desk aquarium for an animal-rescue facility in North Carolina; baseball player Shane Victorino wants a Hawaiian-theme tank for his home, but the finished product may not fit through the door.

episodes.name: Tanks on Tap
episodes.overview: The Las Vegas Natural History Museum wants an aquarium that features a carousel with seahorses, while a wine-and-spirits shop in Latham, N.Y., requests a tank in the shape of a giant bottle. Also: Wayde's nervous about his daughter's first date.

episodes.name: Tank This
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde revisit some of the most unthinkable items the ATM crew has turned into tanks over the years. They share never before seen footage that documents the challenge of creating some of the most unconventional tanks.

episodes.name: Give a Dog a Phone
episodes.overview: A tank that's a working phone is built for a communications company at a trade show in Las Vegas; a client wants an aquarium that can also function as a doghouse. Also: Wayde and Brett come down with the flu, so Brett's dad is put in charge of the office, much to the staff's chagrin.

episodes.name: Hang Ten Barbeque
episodes.overview: A restaurant in Florida requests a tank that resembles a giant wave; a Las Vegas barbecue joint wants a cylindrical aquarium with a pig's head and feet.

episodes.name: Character Favorites
episodes.overview: The Acrylic Tank Manufacturing staff recalls their favorite tanks.

episodes.name: Dining with the Fishes
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett partner up with a servingware company to build a unique table tank to display at a Vegas tradeshow; Crab Corner wants a replica crabbing boat aquarium.

episodes.name: Making History
episodes.overview: A look back at some of the unforgettable tanks inspired by moments in history.

episodes.name: Shark Buffet
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett travel to the heart of Alabama to build a giant center bar aquarium for the owners of Creek Casino. This tank marks ATM's 10,000th tank and one of the largest they've ever built!

episodes.name: The Winds of Trade
episodes.overview: Marine wildlife artist Guy Harvey asks ATM to create an aquarium for a Florida resort that's big enough for guests to snorkel inside it. Meanwhile, back in Las Vegas, Brett's dad thinks about retiring because he doesn't like how he's being treated, but no one believes him.

episodes.name: SHAQ-SIZED
episodes.overview: The guys face their biggest challenge yet after Wayde bumps into basketball legend and four-time NBA Champion Shaquille O'Neal who requests an aquarium built inside the front end of a semi truck.

episodes.name: Pete Rose Scores a Tank
episodes.overview: Baseball legend Pete Rose wants Riverfront Stadium transformed into an aquarium, but his fianc√©e will not let the guys install Pete's dream tank inside their house. Wayde & Heather travel to South Carolina to build a huge aquarium.

episodes.name: Channeling the Long Island Medium
episodes.overview: World famous Long Island Medium Theresa Caputo has asked Wayde and Brett to build her not one but two aquariums in a single week! The first is a mermaid tank in the heart of their living room and the other a Koi pond in her backyard.

episodes.name: Medievil Protection
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde build a dragon-guarded gem-filled aquarium for a family in California. A few hours away the guys go on a mission to build an army tank, tank!

episodes.name: The Pirate Queen
episodes.overview: Drag queen Frank Marino, spokesperson for the Vegas bedding store, Holy Sheets, asks Wayde & Brett to create a bed tank that will make customers want to sleep with the fishes. In Perdido Key, FL the guys build a Pirate Ship tank.

episodes.name: Pipe Dreams
episodes.overview: ATM tackles one of their largest builds to date as they create two connecting tanks that total nearly 250,000 gallons of water for an aquarium attraction in Florida where visitors can dive with sharks.

episodes.name: The Purr-fect Tank
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett build a 1,500-gallon aquarium into the restaurant ceiling at the Royal Blues Hotel in Florida that can also be seen from the hotel's pool. In Seattle the guys build a tank for worldwide internet sensation Henri the Cat.

episodes.name: Fish-a-Palooza
episodes.overview: In this Fish-a-palooza special, we're sharing facts about the coolest and craziest fish we've built tanks for including rare sea creatures, exotic fish, and feisty crabs.

episodes.name: Saved by the Spell
episodes.overview: TV star Mario Lopez & the guys of ATM come together to transform a 90's coin-operated video game into an interactive aquarium featuring an exercise bike. In Vegas, an illusionist asks ATM to build him a tank for his latest show.

episodes.name: Wilmer Valderrana
episodes.overview: Hollywood actor and producer Wilmer Valderrama asks the guys to build a unique tank with multiple angles and slanted sides. In Grand Rapids, Michigan a health center wants a tank that mimics the city's famous rapids.

episodes.name: Tank You Come Again!
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett visit some of their old clients who have new tank challenges. Jackass producer Jeff Tremaine has trouble feeding the eels in his tank, and the clients at Malibu Winery had a fire that damaged their outdoor aquarium.

episodes.name: Tanked Again for the Holidays
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett ring in the holiday season and kick up the heat when they build a beefed up tank for a jerky store. The guys head to Florida to install a pub-themed tank for an Irish Family bar, but luck is not on their side.

episodes.name: When the Moon(shine) Hits Your Eye
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett travel to Tennessee, where the Hatfield & McCoy's dinner theater wants to replace an old moonshine still with an aquarium. A Las Vegas optician is looking for an anatomically correct eye ball tank to put in his lobby.

episodes.name: Howie Mandel Is the Brains Behind ATM
episodes.overview: Comedian Howie Mandel wants a tank for his production office, but he can't decide on what kind he's looking for, so Brett and Wayde are on their own with the design.

episodes.name: Dwight Howard's Slithering Slam Dunk
episodes.overview: NBA star Dwight Howard requests a fish tank and a new home for his pet snakes at his Texas mansion.

episodes.name: Gabriel Iglesias' Fluffy Tank
episodes.overview: Comedian Gabriel Iglesias requests a tank inspired by his fascination with Volkswagen buses for his remodeled office, but the job is interrupted by a robbery at ATM's headquarters.

episodes.name: Marshawn Lynch Goes Beastmode
episodes.overview: The NFL's Marshawn Lynch wants a tank inspired by his clothing brand.

episodes.name: Jeff Dunham's Tank for Dummies
episodes.overview: Ventriloquist Jeff Dunham wants ATM to build a theater-themed tank with a submerged working chandelier, starring his characters Peanut, Walter and Achmed.

episodes.name: The Hoff gets a Tank
episodes.overview: Actor David Hasselhoff wants an aquarium that recalls his time on "Baywatch" and "Knight Rider," and the job includes an inspirational trip to the Aquarium of the Pacific in Long Beach, Cal.

episodes.name: Penn & Teller Monkey Magic
episodes.overview: Magicians Penn and Teller request an aquarium for their backstage greenroom to commemorate their 40th anniversary.

episodes.name: Sherri Shepard on the Rocks
episodes.overview: Sherri Shepherd on the Rocks (Repeat, TV-PG) Actress and TV host Sherri Sheppard wants a simple but elegant tank for her home, so she contacts Wayde and Brett and asks them to build it for her.

episodes.name: Bill Engvall Here's Your Tank!
episodes.overview: Comedian Bill Engvall wants a Zen-like aquarium for his new office in Hollywood, but the plan could be derailed by weight restrictions. Also: The team build a tank for magician Penn Jillette's Las Vegas home that includes fish, lizards and insects.

episodes.name: Tanks n' Roses
episodes.overview: Former Guns N' Roses guitarist DJ Ashba requests a skull-theme aquarium.

episodes.name: Boyz II Men to ATM
episodes.overview: Boyz II Men's Nathan Morris requests a custom aquarium that will sit inside an old fireplace. Also: Wayde and Brett install a 1000-gallon tank for an octopus exhibit at the Greensboro Science Center in North Carolina.

episodes.name: NBA Wizardry
episodes.overview: The NBA's John Wall requests an aquarium shaped like a giant pair of dice. Meanwhile, the ATM team goes to Georgia to build a lighthouse aquarium for a seafood restaurant that features engravings of dolphins.

episodes.name: Chicago Bull Boom Box
episodes.overview: That's just what the hosts of Animal Planet's Tanked gave him. The show, which hooks people up with unique fish tanks and aquariums, gave Butler the one-of-a-kind tank right in his home.

episodes.name: Shaq-A-Tank!
episodes.overview: NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal is a repeat customer when he asks for another aquarium, but this time he wants one with an Egyptian theme.

episodes.name: Holiday Madness
episodes.overview: ATM rings in the holiday season as Wayde and Brett each try to out build one another in the world's first ever Tank Off! The competition between then heats up as Jackass creator Jeff Tremaine returns to judge who built the most badass tank!

episodes.name: Flashback to the First
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett ring in 2016 by looking back on their first episode.

episodes.name: 100 Episodes STRONG!
episodes.overview: Assembling a Florida Gators-themed tank for alumnus, WWE Superstar, former tag-team champion and one half of the Prime-Time Players, Titus O'Neil to commemorate the 100th episode.

episodes.name: Johnny Damon Is Expecting the Unexpected
episodes.overview: Two-time MLB World Series champion Johnny Damon and his wife, expecting a child, want the ATM crew to help reveal the gender of their baby at a party by building two different tanks.

episodes.name: Nick Carter Wants His Tank That Way
episodes.overview: ATM builds a paddle boat-themed aquarium in Los Angeles for Nick Carter of the popular boy band Backstreet Boys.

episodes.name: Prince Fielder's Big Hit
episodes.overview: ATM builds a large, saltwater aquarium in the man cave of the Texas Rangers' first baseman, Prince Fielder, for his Orlando, Florida home.

episodes.name: 2 Chainz, 1 Tank
episodes.overview: ATM constructs an aquarium of the glowing Atlanta skyline for rap superstar 2 Chainz.

episodes.name: Prince Royce Gets a Royal Tank
episodes.overview: Latin music star Prince Royce spices up his Miami mansion with a custom aquarium made by ATM. Wayde and Brett struggle to make this tank as royal as possible but a last minute design change to the fa√ßade delays the build.

episodes.name: Imaginarium Tank
episodes.overview: The Imaginarium Science Center has asked ATM to design a GIANT ship shaped tank with a replica of the USCGC Mohwak inside. Creating the unique shape of this tank proves an ocean sized headache.

episodes.name: Bellagio Makeover
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett take on one of the most popular hotels in the world The Bellagio Hotel and Casino! Five times a year the Bellagio performs a massive makeover to their conservatory, and this year they want to add two giant aquariums!

episodes.name: Party Rockin' Tank
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett make a tank for world famous artist DJ Redfoo of the band LMFAO. The guys attempt their very first DJ booth aquarium. Will this tank get the party started or will Wayde and Brett fail to make this Party Rock?

episodes.name: Internet Tank Sensation
episodes.overview: YouTube superstar Roman Atwood is known for his outrageous pranks. Roman commissions ATM to build an aquarium complete with his company name, Smile More. When one prank in the shop causes chaos, ATM struggles to complete the tank.

episodes.name: Fish Flop Hip Hop
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett are building 2 centerpiece tanks for hip hop star Akon's new dream house. Everything must be perfect before Akon can move in. Will they get the job done or will their dreams of hip hop stardom derail Akon's dream build?

episodes.name: Fish City, Kid
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett are making a tank for Hip Hop artist Tyga. In honor of his hit single Rack City, Wayde & Brett set out to find a way to fill a tank with cash. Will they leave Tyga feeling like a million bucks or come up shortchanged?

episodes.name: Real Aquariums of Beverly Hills
episodes.overview: Erika Girardi from the hit TV show, The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills needs a tank. Also known as Erika Jayne, this Diva knows exactly what she wants and that's an octopus!

episodes.name: DJ of Dragons
episodes.overview: World famous DJ Steve Aoki wants to get Tanked! But this job will be way harder than pressing play. Steve wants a custom, 3-headed dragon inside his tank! The guys have to make sure this job is as outrageous as the DJ himself.

episodes.name: Country Superstar Surprise!
episodes.overview: Brittany Kerr, wife of country superstar Jason Aldean, wants Wayde and Brett to surprise her husband with a fish tank. The great outdoors themed tank has to be a total secret and built before Jason returns from his tour.

episodes.name: Nacho Average Fish Tanks
episodes.overview: Snap On Tools is hosting their annual convention and needs ATM‚Äôs help to wow their attendees. And, Las Vegas restaurant Nacho Daddy has demanded a custom terrarium.

episodes.name: Going for the Gold(fish)
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett get into the patriotic spirit when Olympic basketball phenom Paul George gives them a call. He wants 2 identical fish tanks next to his indoor pond, & he wants it done by the time he gets home from the Olympics in Rio.

episodes.name: The Miami Heat Is On!
episodes.overview: 7 foot tall NBA Star Hassan Whiteside knows a thing or two about what it means to be BIG. He tasks Wayde & Brett with building him a tank SO BIG it won't fit through the front door & has to be delivered to his Miami pad on a barge!

episodes.name: Thumbs Up!
episodes.overview: The Thumb is not your ordinary gas station. This one stop shop sells BBQ & their renovation won‚Äôt be complete without a custom fish tank. Wayde & Brett are ready for dessert when Las Vegas‚Äô own Donut Bar calls with a plan for a tank.

episodes.name: Tanks for the Help
episodes.overview: Meet the Bottled Ocean team, they maintain dozens of aquatic habitats across the Sunshine state, from 360,000 gallon resort exhibits to custom aquariums. Wayde & Brett join the crew & it‚Äôs all hands on deck to repair a gator exhibit.

episodes.name: We Fish You a Merry Christmas
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett team up with Australian Pop star, Alli Simpson to help spread some holiday cheer. They travel to Flint, Michigan to donate an incredible aquarium to the Children‚Äôs Miracle Network and the Hurley Children‚Äôs Hospital.

episodes.name: Tank of Jericho
episodes.overview: When WWE Superstar Chris Jericho wants a tank for his family, he calls aquatic champions Wayde & Brett to make it happen. He wants a replica championship belt & List of Jericho in the tank. Will they be victorious or put on the List?

episodes.name: Kevin Smith's Tortally Awesome Tank
episodes.overview: Things are about to get fishy for world famous filmmaker Kevin Smith. He has two turtles & one tortoise that desperately need a new home. Kevin dreams of a tank that can house both, but they require two different living environments.

episodes.name: Shark Byte
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett have a huge job on their hands, 5,000 gallons huge! Computer component manufacturer Samtec wants ATM to build them an aquarium unlike any other: a 20-foot-long shark tank with exact replicas of their products inside.

episodes.name: Alyssa's Charmed Tank
episodes.overview: Actress, activist, & entrepreneur Alyssa Milano takes time out her busy schedule to ask Wayde & Brett to create a tank for her family. The boys must bring their A game to give her everything, including a wine rack built into the tank.

episodes.name: Sweet Tank O' Mine
episodes.overview: ATM loves DJ Ashba! The rock star wants a tank for his new retail store, but he needs it ASAP. DJ will be hosting a grand opening party & the tank will be the centerpiece. Will Wayde & Brett make his deadline?

episodes.name: Ty Dolla's Fresh Tank
episodes.overview: Hip-hop artist Ty Dolla $ign wants a tank in his house in Long Beach! He calls in Wayde and Brett to construct a huge freshwater tank. Complete with a real rock insert, perfect replicas of Ty's awards, and embedded into a wall.

episodes.name: Panama City Beach Tank
episodes.overview: The Laketown Wharf resort in Panama City Beach wants a nautical-themed fish tank to be the centerpiece of its new restaurant! With a weathered dock look and colorful sea turtle sculptures this cylindrical tank is bound to be a hit!

episodes.name: Wyclef's Tank Is Ready, or Not?
episodes.overview: Brett and Wayde get called to New Jersey for a tank emergency for world famous music producer, Wyclef Jean. This founder of the legendary group the Fugees has not one but two tanks that could really use ATM's help!

episodes.name: Spin Cycle Spec-Tank-ular!
episodes.overview: Las Vegas Coin Laundry wants an aquarium that will knock customers' socks off. A tank built into a real washer/dryer unit just like the others in their store! An Optometrist wants an eye-popping underwater world for their patients.

episodes.name: Extreme Pond Off! Wayde vs. Brett
episodes.overview: Wayde & Brett are going head-to-head on this one. They both want a one-of-a-kind, extreme pond in their backyard. This duo is keeping everything top secret from each other. Only one family can reign supreme. Let the battle begin!

episodes.name: Antonio Brown's Touchdown Tank
episodes.overview: The ATM crew pulls out all the stops to keep NFL superstar Antonio Brown motivated with an aquarium and an end zone dance.

episodes.name: San Francisco Giants Tank
episodes.overview: The San Francisco Giants commission the ATM crew to recreate McCovey Cove inside of a tank large enough to impress loyal fans.

episodes.name: Dwight Howard's Slamming Snake Tank
episodes.overview: Basketball legend Dwight Howard returns to the ATM crew for a habitat large enough to house all 14 of his snakes.

episodes.name: Adrian Peterson's MVP Tank
episodes.overview: The ATM crew must not only impress NFL superstar, Adrian Peterson, but also his wife with a fully decorated tank that fits perfectly in their wall.

episodes.name: Shark Tank in the Shark Tank
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett are designing a tank for the San Jose Sharks hockey team! With replica hockey gear, the San Jose Sharks logo and of course sharks! With the start of the season approaching, will the boys score a goal or end up in the penalty box?

episodes.name: Tanked in Sonoma
episodes.overview: ATM has been so busy they could use a glass of wine! Good thing their next tank is on a vineyard. CEO of Jordan Winery wants a beautiful reef tank to live on his winery. After all, what's better than sipping on a merlot and watching the ocean?

episodes.name: Anthony Davis' High Brow Tank
episodes.overview: Wayde and Brett are designing an all-new aquarium for NBA superstar Anthony Davis! ATM has their work cut out for them in order to please the power forward who wants to transform an entire room into an aquarium.

episodes.name: The Tank of Atlantis
episodes.overview: The ATM crew races for the finish line when a Las Vegas amusement park commissions a 20 foot long tank featuring the lost city of Atlantis to celebrate 25 years in business.

episodes.name: This Tank Is Ludacris!
episodes.overview: Rapper and actor Ludacris is ready to get Tanked! He wants Brett and Wayde to build him a classy and sophisticated aquarium with lots of exotic fish. It's a race against the clock to get Ludacris his new aquarium.

episodes.name: Napping with the Fishes
episodes.overview: The Holiday season is here and so is another huge client for ATM! CEO of Zappos thinks his employees deserve a nap room! Wayde and Brett accept the challenge to make a 24-foot-long tank with individual sleeping pods.

episodes.name: Keyshia Cole's Dream Tank
episodes.overview: R&B singer Keyshia Cole is literally dreaming of a beautiful saltwater aquarium in her home and wants to make it a reality! Luckily for ATM, Keyshia's social media followers led her to them! Will Wayde and Brett be able to fulfill Keyshia's dream?

episodes.name: Brett's Donut Mania Tank
episodes.overview: Donut Mania is Brett's newest business venture and they are about to have their grand opening. Wayde and the whole team want to congratulate him with a surprise fish tank!

episodes.name: Triple Tank Throwdown!
episodes.overview: Businessman Brad Jennings is building a new office and wants to top it off with three tanks from ATM! Wayde and Brett are challenged to come up with three complementary interiors and one even has a working fireplace!

episodes.name: Fernando Vargas's Knockout Tank
episodes.overview: Former boxing champ Fernando Vargas asks Wayde and Brett to make a boxing glove-shape tank for his gym in Las Vegas, but this challenge goes well beyond the ring.

episodes.name: Mel's Drive In Tank
episodes.overview: California restaurant Mel's Drive In wants a tank for their new location in Santa Monica. The owners want a nostalgic feel and a ton of insert pieces that represent Mel's storied history while pointing to the restaurant's future.

episodes.name: Howie Mandel's Surprise Tank
episodes.overview: Howie Mandel has reached out to ATM for another tank! Only this time it's a surprise for his manager's company. 3 Arts Entertainment already has an existing tank but it needs a serious upgrade.

episodes.name: Gangster Tank
episodes.overview: The Mob Museum makes Wayde and Brett an offer they can't refuse! They want a tank with replica sunken rumrunner for their prohibition exhibit and speakeasy in downtown Las Vegas.

episodes.name: The Amazing Piano Tank
episodes.overview: Pianoworks in East Rochester, NY wants Wayde and Brett to build them a piano of their own. This one is made out of acrylic and filled with fish, of course! Can the guys make a tank that strikes the right chord, or will they need a tune up?

episodes.name: The Fast and the Fishiest
episodes.overview: Lusso Auto Spa designs customizations for high-end and rare vehicles. Now they want an exotic fish tank to match their amazing automobiles! They've commissioned a massive 14 ft, three-sided wonder that will sit amidst their multi-million dollar cars.

episodes.name: Kurt Busch's Tank-a-dega 500
episodes.overview: ATM start your engines because NASCAR driver Kurt Busch wants to get tanked! Kurt and his wife are requesting a little piece of paradise inside their aquarium. They want to replicate their wedding location!

episodes.name: The Wonderful Dr. Oz Tank
episodes.overview: Health expert Dr. Oz wants to add to his family.

episodes.name: Wildfire Rescue Tribute Tank
episodes.overview: A mall wants a tank to honor heroes that helped during recent wildfires.

episodes.name: DeMarcus Cousins and a Snake Tank
episodes.overview: Basketball superstar DeMarcus Cousins wants a corner tank for his home.

episodes.name: Urijah Faber's Ultimate Fish Tank
episodes.overview: Mixed Martial Arts fighter Urijah Faber wants some ocean in his new gym.

episodes.name: All in the Ocean
episodes.overview: The Ocean Casino Resort in Atlantic City wants to bring the ocean inside.

episodes.name: Clay Matthews' Green Bay Eel Tank
episodes.overview: Linebacker Clay Matthews wants a custom tank for his dream home.

episodes.name: Healing Garden Waterfall
episodes.overview: The guys get a request for a custom acrylic waterfall for a memorial.

episodes.name: A Merry Fishy Christmas
episodes.overview: The guys build a giant tank for a Holiday Cactus Lighting event.

episodes.name: Tracy Morgan's Giant Shark Tank Under Construction
episodes.overview: Tracy Morgan wants the guys to tank his pool house for his massive sharks.

episodes.name: Tracy Morgan's Giant Shark Tank Revealed!
episodes.overview: Winter is coming and Tracy Morgan is still waiting for his shark tank.
